channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Azure DevOps Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Azure DevOps Server

item.title: CVE-2019-0869|2024-08-04T17:58:59.578Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Azure DevOps Server when it fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Azure DevOps Server HTML Injection Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0700|2024-08-04T06:11:05.579Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0874|2024-08-04T17:58:59.878Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0996|2024-08-04T18:06:31.230Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Azure DevOps Server when it improperly handles requests to authorize applications, resulting in a cross-site request forgery, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0875|2024-08-04T17:58:59.877Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server 2019 does not properly enforce project permissions, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1327|2024-08-04T06:32:01.196Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Azure DevOps Server when it fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Azure DevOps Server HTML Injection Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0857|2024-08-04T17:58:59.880Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability that could allow a security feature bypass exists in when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1326|2024-08-04T06:32:00.660Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.
